channel.title: Softlayer_network_storage_hub_swift_share on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_network_storage_hub_swift_share on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Hub_Swift_Share
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Hub_Swift_Share Service Datatype Description Methods getContainerList Get a list of the file containers for a brand. getFile Download a file. getFileList Get a list of the files in a container and path.

item.title: getContainerList
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Hub_Swift_Share::getContainerList Get a list of the file containers for a brand. Overview This method returns a collection of container objects. Parameters Name Type Description Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers Return Values SoftLayer_Container_Network_Storage_Hub_ObjectStorage_Folder[]

item.title: getFile
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Hub_Swift_Share::getFile Download a file. Overview This method returns a file object given the file’s full name. Parameters Name Type Description fileName string name of the file to download. container string Name of the container that the file is in. Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers Return Values SoftLayer_Container_Network_Storage_Hub_ObjectStorage_File

item.title: getFileList
item.description: SoftLayer_Network_Storage_Hub_Swift_Share::getFileList Get a list of the files in a container and path. Overview This method returns a collection of the file objects within a container and the given path. Parameters Name Type Description container string Name of a container path string The file name, this could contain ‘/’s to denote a pseudo directory structure Required Headers authenticate Optional Headers resultLimit Return Values SoftLayer_Container_Utility_File_Entity[]
